# Linux操作系统下C语言编程入门（007xiong）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/linux-caozuoxitong-xia-c-yuyan-biancheng-rumen-007xiong
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/linux-caozuoxitong-xia-c-yuyan-biancheng-rumen-007xiong
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install linux-caozuoxitong-xia-c-yuyan-biancheng-rumen-007xiong
linux-caozuoxitong-xia-c-yuyan-biancheng-rumen-007xiong <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g linux-caozuoxitong-xia-c-yuyan-biancheng-rumen-linglingqixiong
linux-caozuoxitong-xia-c-yuyan-biancheng-rumen-linglingqixiong <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
